## Job.changeDelay() method

Change delay of a delayed job.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
changeDelay(delay: number): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  delay | number | milliseconds to be added to current time. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

void
